column5: I just helped setup the webcam for the Greater Nipissing Stewardship Council. It's set to refresh every 15 min or so. In the spring were gonna move it so there is a better view of the mouth of the Sturgeon River, but for now its pointed out to look south. it looks pretty grey out there right now.  http://www.greaternipissing.ca  and  http://greaternipissing.ca/webcam.html
